ingredientLines: 1 can (135 g or 4.5 oz net weight) good-quality sardines packed in olive oil
1 large shallot or small onion, about 100 grams (3.5 ounces), thinly sliced
250 ml (1 cup) good-quality tomato coulis or canned cherry tomatoes* (not tomato paste or concentrate)
hot sauce or chili pur√©e, to taste (optional)
200 grams (7 ounces) spaghetti (I like to get spelt or semi whole wheat spaghetti)
fresh flat-leaf parsley, leaves coarsely chopped (optional)
